Academic Office : +607-5333716 | Email : academic-fcee@utm.my | Administration Office : +607-5533499 [fcee@utm.my](mailto:fcee@utm.my) * [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/fktutm/) * [RSS](https://news.utm.my/) * [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/fktutm/) * [RSS](https://news.utm.my/) [![](https://fkt.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/MKPP-MASTER-OF-PETROLEUM-ENGINEERING-724x1024.png "MKPP - MASTER OF PETROLEUM ENGINEERING")](https://fkt.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/MKPP-MASTER-OF-PETROLEUM-ENGINEERING.png) ###### _Updated : 10 March 2023_ **MASTER OF PETROLEUM ENGINEERING** **Programme Specification** The master’s degree in Petroleum Engineering is designed to address the need for skilled Petroleum Engineering professionals by integrating the basic and advanced knowledge of petroleum engineering ranging from upstream to downstream. The programme targets both fresh graduates and experienced candidates and aims to provide quality post-graduate education to enhance the career opportunity and development of candidates. The programme is offered on a full-time basis at the UTM campus in Johor Bahru and Kuala Lumpur and offered to any candidates with a bachelor’s degree in Science, Technology, and Engineering. Graduates from other disciplines with an experience of more than 5 years in the oil and gas industry are encouraged and welcomed to apply. The minimum study duration is 1.5 years (3 semesters) and the maximum is 4 years (8 semesters). * [The Program Educational Objectives (PEOs)](https://fkt.utm.my/master-of-petroleum-engineering-2-2#) *
